title: SonicWall security advisory (AV25-774)
description: On November 19, 2025, SonicWall published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Email Security (multiple models)  version 10.0.33.8195 and prior
Gen7 hardware Firewalls (multiple models)  version 7.3.0-7012 and prior
Gen7 virtual Firewalls (NSv) (multiple models)  version 7.3.0-7012 and prior
Gen8 Firewalls (multiple models)  version 8.0.2-8011 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
